questions.Instruccion: Match the examples with the use of Present perfect they represent

questions.question: Ed has taught the same courses for 3 years.
questions.answer: Actions or situations that began in the past but continue in the present

questions.question: My parents have bought a beautiful house on the beach
questions.answer: Recent event which have a result in the present

questions.question: I've travelled in South America
questions.answer: An experience in someone's lifetime, without saying the exact time when the event occurred
